sentence.Network_en: The work has been going swimmingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 工作进展得一直很顺利。

sentence.Network_en: We hope everything will go swimmingly .
sentence.Network_cn: 我们希望一切进展顺利。

sentence.Network_en: In spite of one or two minor mishaps everything was going swimmingly.
sentence.Network_cn: 尽管遇到了一两件小小的不幸,一切都进行得很顺利.

PerfectNetExp.abs: swimming 游水swimmingly 顺畅地swimmy 眩晕的
语言点讲解：swimmingly adv. 顺利地；轻易地我们现在准备出发了。
swimmingly 容易地, swimmingly 顺畅, swimmingly 畅通
The bride looked beautiful and the whole wedding swimmingly ., 新娘看上去很漂亮 , 整个婚礼进行得很顺利.

list.abs: ... Pull yourself together 振作起来 Going swimmingly 进展顺利 In the same boat 同舟共济.
Despite of some mishaps , everything went swimmingly ., 虽然出现一些不好的东西 , 但一切都进展得非常顺利.
★swimmer n 游泳运动员, 游泳者swimmingly smoothly 顺利的swimming market 繁荣的市场 boom depression

entry.def: If you say that something is going swimmingly, you mean that everything is happening in a satisfactory way, without any problems.

example.ex: The work has been going swimmingly.
example.tran: 工作进展得一直很顺利。

sentences.sentence: "in spite of some mishaps, everything went swimmingly"

auth_sentence.content: Over the Downs, all appears to be going swimmingly in Chichester.
auth_sentence.res_content: Over the Downs, all appears to be going swimmingly in Chichester.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Over the Downs, all appears to be going swimmingly in Chichester.

auth_sentence.content: I said, Well, if you're sitting in the corner office with a nice view, yeah, the economy's doing swimmingly well.
auth_sentence.res_content: I said, Well, if you're sitting in the corner office with a nice view, yeah, the economy's doing swimmingly well.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said, Well, if you're sitting in the corner office with a nice view, yeah, the economy's doing swimmingly well.

sentences.en: In spite of one or two minor mishaps everything was going swimmingly.
sentences.cn: 除了几个细微的错误，一切都很不错。
